text: niccayamāka allāh uṅkaḷukkup pala pōrkkaḷaṅkaḷil utavi ceytirukkiṉṟāṉ; (niṉaivu kūṟuṅkaḷ;) āṉāl huṉaiṉ (pōr naṭanta) aṉṟu. Uṅkaḷaip perumakiḻcci koḷḷac ceyta uṅkaḷuṭaiya atikamāṉa (makkaḷ) tokai uṅkaḷukku evvitap palaṉum aḷikkavillai, (mikavum) paranta pūmi uṅkaḷukku (appōtu) curukkamākiviṭṭatu. Aṉṟiyum nīṅkaḷ puṟaṅkāṭṭip piṉvāṅkalāṉīrkaḷ
